Changelog
---------

0.3.0 (2014-05-31)
++++++++++++++++++

* Add support for JSON web token authentication.

0.2.1 (2013-11-24)
++++++++++++++++++

* Add authentication to ``TestResponse.click`` and ``TestResponse.clickbutton``.

0.2.0 (2013-10-15)
++++++++++++++++++

* Add support for JSON methods (e.g. ``app.post_json``, etc.)

0.1.0 (2013-10-06)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release.
* HTTP Basic Authentication working.
